featured.text: Unconventional solutions can also be explored.
Which of the following statements is true? (A) Unconventional proms have been organized since the 1960s.

definition.zh_def: 不循常規的，與傳統或普遍接受的觀念不同的。
definition.en_def: Not based on or conforming to what is generally done or believed.
definition.example: Her unconventional approach to problem-solving often leads to innovative solutions.
